name: RC Drift Racing
description:
The most excited RC-Car racing game, behind the wheel of master truck. Get ready to do literally what the hell you want on the road in which like table tap, and house tap. Drift, jumps, smash cars, and rocks in the table map.

Master your RC-car, racing in the highway road. there are many missions to get, racing with speed as fast as you can. Unlock more maps, and racing with more players, upgrade the top speed, accelerating force, handing and stability for each car.
Compete against the world with global score, the more skidding done by and more airtime keep the RC-car, more points you earn.

RC Master Racing Features:
-Excited RC-car racing
-Magic masters
-Tile breaker
-Flex to control
-Drift or drive with fast speed
-Jumps, smash cars and rocks
-Unlock more RC-cars
-Beautiful racing sceneary
-Interested background

Master your RC-car with fast speed in the highway, download it with your friends.
